information-type.name: Default
information-type.description: This information type is used to tag information that will not be tagged with any other information types.

information-type.name: Document Security
information-type.description: Information type that is used to define the level of access to a document created with a given form.

information-type.name: Form Design
information-type.description: Information Type that is used to define the access level that the user has when designing a form.

information-type.name: Form Security
information-type.description: Information type that is used to determine whether the user is able to configure the security policy for the form.
